testcase.name: Validate the Notification Preferences API for valid device ID
testcase.system-out: Given a authoriztionId and device ID "f44abee1-872d-47ff-80e2-0c74880fcdf9".passed When I send a GET request to Notification Preferences API endpoint..........passed Then the response status code of Notification Preferences API request should be "200".passed And the response body should contain the user's notification preferences....passed

testcase.name: Validate the Notification Preferences API for an invalid device ID
testcase.system-out: Given a authoriztionId and device ID "f44abee1-872d-80e2-0c74880fcdf9"......passed When I send a GET request to Notification Preferences API endpoint..........passed Then the response status code of Notification Preferences API request should be "404".passed

testcase.name: Validate the Notification Preferences API for an invalid device ID 2
testcase.system-out: Given a authoriztionId and device ID "".....................................passed When I send a GET request to Notification Preferences API endpoint..........passed Then the response status code of Notification Preferences API request should be "404".passed

testcase.name: Validate the Notification Preferences API for an unauthorized user
testcase.system-out: Given a invalid authoriztionId and device ID "f44abee1-872d-47ff-80e2-0c74880fcdf9" exists in the system.passed When I send a GET request to Notification Preferences API endpoint..........passed Then the response status code of Notification Preferences API request should be "401".passed
